name: Mr. Triangle's Maze (itch)
description:
Mr. Triangle's Maze is an action-puzzle game starring Mr. Triangle! Mr. Triangle and his friends have been enjoying a time of peace, until the sinister Creator appears and threatens his world and imprisons him in a digital labyrinth of puzzles and challenges. If Mr. Triangle can't escape the maze world that the Creator has trapped him in and defeat the evil Maze Masters his entire world will be doomed!

Features 55 puzzle stages and 9 boss battles
Large variety of power-ups and abilities
New gameplay mechanics are progressively introduced
Retro feel and retro challenges
Original soundtrack written by Soda Piggy

Red Triangle Games is an independent game studio based in Northeast Florida. We are a small team consisting of Matthew Edson (project lead, art direction), Soda Piggy / W. James Pandelis (music and sounds), and Nick Leja (programming). Some of our noteworthy titles include the official Axe Cop game and the Red Triangle Super Collection, which includes a variety of offerings. Red Triangle Games strives to create quality, family-friendly fun games using the OHR.RPG.CE.

Mr. Triangle's Maze is a passion project between two dear friends, starting in 2008 and finally releasing in 2022. Life and other projects kept bumping it but now that it's finally released we hope you enjoy the game as much as we did working on it throughout the years.
